message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to us, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12000. We understand its worth to you might be different, but we hope this offer will be attractive enough for you to consider.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you've placed on the product,  $12000 is unfortunately outside of my budget. I'm willing to pay $8500 for it. This reflects the maximum value I can see in the product for my needs.  I hope this counteroffer is reasonable.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to engage in this discussion. Considering your offer and the value we place on the product, we would like to counter with a price of $9500. We believe this offers a fair compromise between the value we see in the product and your budget constraints.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility. $9500 is closer to where I'd like to be, but I'm still just a bit outside of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9000 for the product. This would allow me to move forward with the purchase and would be a fair compromise considering the value we both see in it.

Thank you for your continued engagement, Bob. We appreciate your effort to find a mutually beneficial solution. Considering your latest offer and our product's value, we would like to propose a price of $9300. We believe this strikes a good balance between the value we see in the product and your budget constraints.
